title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. I, subch. B, pt. 4117 - Racing And Track Rules
content:

§ 4117.4 - Racing violations

§ 4117.8 - Whips, goads and head poles

§ 4117.10 - Breaking horses

§ 4117.12 - Setting horses back

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. I, subch. B, pt. 4117

Statutory authority: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and

Breeding Law, §§101, 104[1], [19], 128, 301; L. 1940, ch. 254, §
36, as amd

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
